title: Tesla (TSLA) announces date and time of the Q2 2025 Earnings Call
paragraphs: The automaker disclosed its second-quarter vehicle production and delivery numbers on Wednesday. In Q2 2025, Tesla’s electric vehicle sales increased significantly compared to the first quarter, and the company also sustained its energy storage business.
Although Tesla has made a comeback as far as overall vehicle sales are concerned. However, the automaker wasn’t able to sell enough Cybertrucks, Model S, and Model X vehicles to clear the inventory.
Tesla Model 3 and Model Y have regained much of their sales in Q2 2025. However, Tesla Model Y lost its position as the world’s best-selling vehicle in the second quarter.
